puzzle.title: Christmas Carols
puzzle.hint: Each cassette tape title could spell DIE HARD, but perhaps they spell something else?
The first cassette is DIM HALO
The solution is: ODE TO JOY.

puzzle.title: Ellis & Elevators
puzzle.hint: The two columns contain matching words that are heteronyms
Read the letters of the circles in order from the left side with connected pair of circles
First 4 letters are SIGN
Circles spell out "SIGN CONTRACT AGAIN/ GIVE UP OFFICE"

puzzle.title: Circuit Circus
puzzle.hint: Each numbered box transforms its input according to a rule to produce an output (which is also an English word)
An example is, every second letter of SCARLET is SALT; salt's famous pairing is PEPPER

LIST OF ALL THE TRANSFORMATION RULES
1. Every 2nd letter 2. Opposites 3. Replace inner letters with "R" 4. Transform to Nato Phonetic 5. Famous Pairs 6. First 3 letters + "y" 7. Numeric value of the input 8. First letter last 9. Advance the last letter alphabetically 10. Replace the first letter with "N"
Input DIE HARD to get final answer

puzzle.title: Mapping Mayhem
puzzle.hint: There are 8 ways to order the rooms from page 2 on the grid
Once you have filled in the blanks, these give you hints to one last unique ordering of the rooms
You should have gotten "END LETTER" - using the same ordering you used last, take the end letter of each room

puzzle.title: Yippee Yappy
puzzle.hint: Each line has two parts. The left part is a scrambled version of YIPPEE KI YAY
The right part is a clue that has been scrambled the same way
You should get an instruction on how to unscramble the bottom section
PARTIAL: USE BASE THREE, ZERO IS YIPPEE, ONE IS KI, TWO IS YAY, THEN SHIFT TWO

puzzle.title: Plaza Puzzle (meta puzzle)
puzzle.hint: Place each 6 letter answer in its appropriate floor (floor is listed on each puzzle)
Order letters by clues on the bottom

puzzle.title: Dastardly Demands (bonus puzzle)
puzzle.hint: Each answer in the first column when paired, provides another set of clues
For example the first two answers are RESTAURANT REQUEST, which becomes ORDER
The right hand column provides an instruction
ORDER GROUPS CHECK THIRD LETTER
